title: 2024 Tesla Model 3 Rear-Wheel Drive
description: The 2024 Tesla Model 3 Rear-Wheel Drive offers a more affordable entry into the Tesla lineup with great performance and efficiency. It features a 0-60 mph time of 5.8 seconds, a range of up to 272 miles, and the latest technology including a 15-inch touchscreen display and standard Autopilot features.
meta_title: 2024 Tesla Model 3 Rear-Wheel Drive - Affordable Electric Sedan
meta_description: Get the 2024 Tesla Model 3 Rear-Wheel Drive with 272 miles of range, 0-60 mph in 5.8 seconds, and the latest Tesla technology. A great entry-level electric sedan option.

title: 2024 Tesla Model 3 High Performance
description: The 2024 Tesla Model 3 High Performance edition offers even more power and advanced features for driving enthusiasts. It includes a Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive system, a range of up to 320 miles, and high-performance features such as improved brakes and a lowered suspension.
meta_title: 2024 Tesla Model 3 High Performance - Ultimate Electric Power
meta_description: Experience the 2024 Tesla Model 3 High Performance with Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive, 320 miles of range, and enhanced performance features. The ultimate choice for electric car enthusiasts.
